graph.partitioning

Class HPartitionerMLSPP2

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.partitioning.HPartitionerMLSPP2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HPartitionerIntf

    public class HPartitionerMLSPP2
extends java.lang.Object
implements HPartitionerIntf
    implements multi-level partitioning of hyper-graphs. This class should be used when commercial optimizers such as Gurobi are used, with a cmdline of the form: %>gurobi_cl ResultFile=\\tmp\\sol.txt input.mps

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: parallel optimization 4 java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2010

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
